> [!NOTE]
 This is a messenger chat bot using a personal account. [Origin here](https://github.com/Schmavery/facebook-chat-api) and this may lead to facebook account being locked due to spam or other reasons. 
 So, I recommend using a clone account (one that you're willing to throw away at any time)<br>
 ***I am not responsible for any problems that may arise from using this bot.***

> [!IMPORTANT]
 The contents of this repository may not be used for AI or anything else that Kem deems equivalent.  
 Please be aware of this.

> [!WARNING]
> *There is a risk of your account being banned after running the code, so please ensure proper account management and handling. If it happens, please try logging in again and retrieve your AppState.*

## üöß **Requirement**
- Node.JS 14.x [Download](https://nodejs.org/dist/v14.17.0) | [Home](https://nodejs.org/en/download/) | [Other versions](https://nodejs.org/en/download/releases/)
- Knowledge of **programming**, JavaScript, Node.JS

## **üìö Support Languages in source code**
- Currently, FCA supports 2 languages:
- [x] `en: English`
- [x] `vi: Vietnamese`

+ Support English, VietNamese !,
+ Change language in `FastConfigFca.json` file
```json
"Language": "vi"
```
+ Find Line Language Change:
```json
"Language": "en"
```
+ All bot if using listenMqtt first.

# **üìú API Cho ChatBot Messenger**

Facebook ƒê√£ C√≥ V√† Cho Ng∆∞·ªùi D√πng T·∫°o API Cho Chatbots üò™ T·∫°i ƒêey => **[ƒê√¢y N√®](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/messenger-platform).**

### ***üìú API N√†y C√≥ Th·ªÉ Khi·∫øn Cho B·∫°n Payy Acc Nh∆∞ C√°ch Acc B·∫°n Ch∆∞a T·ª´ng C√≥, H√£y Ch√∫ √ù Nh√© =))***

L∆∞u √ù ! N·∫øu B·∫°n Mu·ªën S√†i API N√†y H√£y Xem Document T·∫°i **[ƒê√¢y N√®](https://github.com/Schmavery/facebook-chat-api).**

## **üìå T·∫£i V·ªÅ**

## ***N·∫øu B·∫°n Mu·ªën Test API =))***

L·ª£i √çch Cho Vi·ªác N√†y Th√¨ B·∫°n S·∫Ω Kh√¥ng T·ªën Th·ªùi Gian Pay Acc V√† C√≥ Acc üò™
H√£y S·ª≠ D·ª•ng V·ªõi T√†i Kho·∫£n Th·ª≠ Nghi·ªám => **[Facebook Whitehat Accounts](https://www.facebook.com/whitehat/accounts/).**

## **üìå C√°ch S·ª≠ D·ª•ng**

```javascript
const login = require("meta-horizonn"); // l·∫•y t·ª´ lib ra 

// ƒëƒÉng nh·∫≠p
login({ email: "Gmail Account", password: "M·∫≠t Kh·∫©u Facebook C·ªßa B·∫°n" }, (err, api) => {

    if(err) return console.error(err); // tr∆∞·ªùng h·ª£p l·ªói

    // t·∫°o bot t·ª± ƒë·ªông nh√°i theo b·∫°n:
    api.listenMqtt((err, message) => {
        api.sendMessage(message.body, message.threadID);
    });

});
```

K·∫øt Qu·∫£ L√† N√≥ S·∫Ω Nh√°i B·∫°n Nh∆∞ H√¨nh D∆∞·ªõi:

## ***üí≠ T·ª± Nghi√™n C·ª©u !!***

N·∫øu B·∫°n Mu·ªën T·ª± Nghi√™n C·ª©u Ho·∫∑c T·∫°o Bot Cho Ri√™ng B·∫°n Th√¨ B·∫°n H√£y V√¥ C√°i N√†y ƒê·ªçc Ch·ª©c NƒÉng C·ªßa N√≥ V√† C√°ch S·ª≠ D·ª•ng => [Link](https://github.com/Schmavery/facebook-chat-api#Unofficial%20Facebook%20Chat%20API)

------------------------------------

### **üìå L∆∞u L·∫°i Th√¥ng Tin ƒêƒÉng Nh·∫≠p.**

ƒê·ªÉ L∆∞u L·∫°i Th√¨ B·∫°n C·∫ßn 1 AppState Ki·ªÉu (Cookie, etc,..) ƒê·ªÉ L∆∞u L·∫°i Ho·∫∑c L√† S·ª≠ D·ª•ng M√£ Login Nh∆∞ Tr√™n ƒê·ªÉ ƒêƒÉng Nh·∫≠p !

V√† Ch·∫ø ƒê·ªô N√†y ƒê√£ C√≥ S·∫µn Trong 1 S·ªë Bot Vi·ªát Nam N√™n B·∫°n C·ª© Y√™n T√¢m Nh√© !

***__H∆∞·ªõng D·∫´n V·ªõi AppState__***

```js
const fs = require("fs");
const login = require("meta-horizonn");

var credentials = { email: "FB_EMAIL", password: "FB_PASSWORD" }; // th√¥ng tin t√†i kho·∫£n

login(credentials, (err, api) => {
    if(err) return console.error(err);
    // ƒëƒÉng nh·∫≠p
    fs.writeFileSync('appstate.json', JSON.stringify(api.getAppState(), null,'\t')); //t·∫°o appstate
});
```
## ***üìú C3C - FBSTATE***

Ho·∫∑c D·ªÖ D√†ng H∆°n ( Chuy√™n Nghi·ªáp ) B·∫°n C√≥ Th·ªÉ D√πng => **[c3c-fbstate](https://github.com/c3cbot/c3c-fbstate)** ƒê·ªÉ L·∫•y FbState V√† ƒê·ªïi T√™n L·∫°i Th√†nh AppState C≈©ng ƒê∆∞·ª£c ! (appstate.json)
